ooc:sorry guys this will be my last post.After that I would like rauq 
to take me out of NBWRPG.I'm giving my chars to whoever wants them.

BIC:~Naga~

He checked the scanner and after a few moment he turns to Tyrael "Sir 
the scanner have found 3 bases(the Decepticon dont seem so alive).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Tyrael thought for a moment. Of course, establishing a perimeter was 
a 
> priority, but making certain that they were at the right place was 
> more important.
> 
> Tyrael: Cancel your present orders. We have to know where we are 
> first. Shadow Star, activate a stasis pod as soon as you have taken 
a 
> beast mode. Once you are done, come and see me. Naga and Talon, 
check 
> the long range scanners for any thermal sources other than 
geological. 
> Try to see if you detect any energy signatures.
> 
> OOC: I'll take the new bot, and anyone else who is interested by a 
> new char, just let me know.
